contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Juno}} '''Juno''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == Mythology == * [[Juno (mythology)]], the Roman goddess of marriage and queen of the gods == Astronomy and space exploration == * [[3 Juno]], an asteroid ** [[Juno clump]], a probable asteroid family in the vicinity of 3 Juno * [[Juno (spacecraft)]], a NASA mission to Jupiter * [[Juno I]], a satellite launch vehicle * [[Juno II]], a rocket * [[Project Juno]], a private British space programme == Biology == * [[Juno (plant)]], a term for bulbous iris species from subgenus ''Scorpiris'', an independent genus ''Juno'' in some classifications * ''[[Dione juno]]'', Juno Longwing, Juno Helconian, Juno Silverspot, butterfly == Film and television == * [[Juno (film)|''Juno'' (film)]], a 2007 Academy Award–winning comedy-drama * ''[[Jenny, Juno]]'', a 2005 Korean film * [[Sailor Juno]], aka JunJun, a character in ''Sailor Moon'' == Music == ;Awards * [[Juno Awards]], a Canadian music award ;Performers * [[Juno (band)]], an American musical group * [[Juno (rapper)]], Finnish hip hop artist * [[Juno (singer)]], South Korean singer Kim Jun-ho * [[Juno Mak]], Hong Kong Chinese pop singer ;Songs * "Juno", song by Throwing Muses on the album ''[[House Tornado]]'' * "Juno", song by Tokyo Police Club on the album ''[[Elephant Shell]]'' * "Juno", song by [[Life Without Buildings]] on the album ''Any Other City'' * "Juno" song by Funeral For A Friend on the EP ''[[Between Order and Model]]'' ;Various * [[Juno (musical)|''Juno'' (musical)]], a Broadway musical * [[Juno (soundtrack)|''Juno'' (soundtrack)]], the soundtrack to the film ''Juno'' * [[Juno Reactor]], a trance music project * [[Juno Records]], an online music store * A line of synthesizers manufactured by the [[Roland Corporation]] ** [[Roland Juno-60]] (early 1980s) ** [[Roland Juno-106]] (1984) ** [[Roland Juno-G]] (2006– ) == Literature == * [[Juno (Dune)|Juno (''Dune'')]], a character in the ''Dune'' universe * [[Asteroids in fiction#Juno|Juno (the asteroid) in fiction]] * ''[[Juno and the Paycock]]'', a play by Sean O'Casey == People == * [[Juno (singer)|Juno]], South Korean singer * "Juno" Blair B, creator of the webcomic ''[[Star Cross'd Destiny]]'' * [[Juno Temple]], an English actress == Vehicles == * {{HMS|Juno}}, the name of nine Royal Navy vessels * [[Honda Juno]], a scooter * A locomotive in the [[South Devon Railway Dido class]] * A locomotive in the [[GWR Banking Class]] * {{MV|Juno}}, several Clyde steamers/ferries == Other == * [[Juno, Georgia]], a town * [[Juno, Texas]], a town * [[Juno Online Services]], an internet service provider * [[Eclipse (software)#Releases|Eclipse Juno]], a nickname for version 4.2 of Eclipse software development environment. * Juno, a recurring [[List of Assassin's Creed characters#Juno|character in the ''Assassin's Creed'']] games * [[Juno Baby]], a line of musically themed children's educational products == See also == * [[Juneau (disambiguation)]] * [[Juno Beach (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
